entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 07:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -17.2°C
Wind: WSW 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023
